text: "There's no doubt in my mind," Eggert said when Kelly asked her if she was in fact a minor when she first had sexual intercourse with Baio, which she said he initiated. "It wasn't a hold-me-down rape me situation, but I was 17. ... I just wasn't ready to tell my story. ... It was upsetting. It wasn't a good experience at all. ... It was at my house in my spare bedroom, he laid down a towel and it happened there."
title: Nicole Eggert details alleged Scott Baio sexual abuse with Megyn Kelly
